caption.p: Photoluminescence properties of K 3LuSi 2O 7:Eu 2+ phosphors. a PL and PLE spectra of K 3LuSi 2O 7:0.01Eu 2+ measured/monitored at 460 and 740 nm, and the inset shows the photograph of K 3LuSi 2O 7:0.01Eu 2+ with deep red body color under natural light. b Room temperature PL spectra of K 3LuSi 2O 7:0.01Eu 2+ under different excitation wavelength from 300 to 470 nm. c The emission spectrum of the K 3LuSi 2O 7:0.01Eu 2+ and Gaussian fitting curves. d Decay curves and fitting results of K 3LuSi 2O 7:0.01Eu measured at 80 K and 300 K under 450 nm pulse laser diode excitation
